HTML5 - Outline

  • The outline represent the document structure
  • Previously, the outline algorithm was only based on the heading elements (h1, ..., h6)
  • With HTML5, it also takes in consideration sectioning content tags: section, article, aside, footer, header et nav)
<h1>Welcome</h1> <section> <h1>About HTML5</h1> <p>So fine...</p> <section> <h1>Better that HTML4?</h1> <p>Yes sure...</p> </section> </section> <footer> <section> <h1>Contact</h1> <p>Feel free to ask your questions</p> </section> <section> <h1>About us</h1> <p>worldline</p> </section> </footer> 1. Welcome 1. About HTML5 1. Better that HTML4? 2. Contact 3. About us

Use this or browsers extensions to test it.
